document_data.name: Hornung's Surge Selector
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Hornung's surge selector''''' was a [[wild magic]] [[spell]] that gave the caster a limited ability to shape [[wild surge]]s their spells produced, either as a side effect or by way of ''[[Nahal's reckless dweomer]]''.

To [[Zakhara]]n mages, always reluctant to acknowledge [[ajami]] names and accomplishments, the spell was known simply as '''''surge selector'''''.
document_data.Components: Proper casting of this spell required [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s and a [[brass]] spinner, which was not consumed during casting.
document_data.Users: As a wild magic spell, ''Hornung's surge selector'' was usable only by [[wild mage]]s. Among those it was considered a common spell.
